contents.content: UNIT 01 求职准备 Job Hunting Preparation
Lesson 10 准备面试 Preparation for the Interview
场景对话
杰克和玛丽在谈论为面试准备相关的物品。

contents.title: 杰克：玛丽，明天我就要去面试了，我好兴奋！
contents.answer: Jack: Mary, I will have an interview tomorrow. I am so excited!

contents.title: 玛丽：恭喜你！对了，你的面试物品都准备好了吗？
contents.answer: Mary: Congratulations! By the way, have you had all the things ready for the interview?

contents.title: 杰克：我只打印了几份简历。
contents.answer: Jack: I only typed several copies of my resume.

contents.title: 玛丽：那还不够，你还有许多东西需要准备。
contents.answer: Mary: That's not enough. You have many other things to prepare.

contents.content:
职场达人小技巧

    如何准备面试物品

    几乎每个用人单位在通知求职者参加面试时，都会顺便告知对方面试时需要携带的物品或材料。如果应聘者忘记携带或缺少面试材料，就有可能不被允许参加面试。

contents.title: 玛丽：除了简历外，你还需要毕业证、身份证的原件和复印件。
contents.answer: Mary: Besides the resume, you also need the original and copies of your graduation certifi cate and your ID card.

contents.title: 玛丽：一寸彩色照片也要准备几张。
contents.answer: Mary: Also several copies of your one-inch color photos.

contents.title: 玛丽：你还需要准备正式的面试服装，最好是西装。
contents.answer: Mary: You also need to prepare formal clothes for the interview; a suit should be the best.

contents.content: \r\n    面试时一定要注意以下几点：一是准时；二是衣着得体、面容干净；三是态度诚恳、不卑不亢；四是谈吐大方、言之有物；五是准备充分，提前对面试的企业、岗位有深入了解。\r\n

contents.title: 杰克：我一会儿就去买。
contents.answer: Jack: I will get it soon.

contents.title: 玛丽：准备一个公文包，把你的面试材料都装在里面，方便携带。
contents.answer: Mary: Have a briefcase ready with all your interview materials in it for easy carrying.

contents.title: 玛丽：大概就这么多东西了。祝你好运！
contents.answer: Mary: All these should be enough. Good luck!

contents.content:
在此需要说明的是，衣着得体并不是说所有的男生都要穿西服，所有的女生都要穿套裙，而是根据你所面试的公司及其职位而定，这一点可以灵活掌握。

    虽然并不是所有的面试都会非常正规，但是求职者应当事先考虑到并做好万全的准备，以备不时之需。
必背例句
1.Before the interview you should have everything you need ready.
面试前要准备好需要用的东西。
2.I am preparing the interview materials.
我在准备面试材料。
3.I am going to type several copies of my resume for tomorrow's interview.
我现在要去打印几份简历，以备明天的面试。
4.You will need the original and copies of the education certifi cate for the interview.
面试需要学历证明的原件和复印件。
5.When attending the interview, men should wear suits.
男士面试时应穿西装。
6.Ladies should wear suit or petticoat to attend the interview.
女士应穿套装或套裙参加面试。
7.It is best that you take a notebook and a pen for the interview.
面试时最好带上笔记本和笔以做记录。
8.The job-hunters should show relevant supporting documents in the interview.
求职者在面试时要出示相关证明材料。
9.In the resume you should specify your personal information as detailed as possible.
简历中要尽可能详细地写明自己的个人信息。
10.If you don't have the interview materials ready, you should not attend the interview．
如果面试材料没有准备好，你可能就无法参加面试。
核心词汇总
graduation certifi cate 毕业证
identity card 身份证
education certifi cate 学历证明
